text: Should I end my life This is a little awkward to say on Reddit  but when I was   years old  I was diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder and ADHD  I had to undergone therapy on my motor skills as well as my speech because I had some minor delays as a little kid  As a result of these delays  I had to be placed in special education services and be registered for an IEP all the way through K Luckily I graduated high school and I m currently attending college  but I ve been in and out of depression from being ashamed of my past since middle school  I m not worried about the ADHD diagnosis as much as autism  but the years of pain and agony from being LABELED as autistic have driven me to almost attempting suicide my sophomore year of high school  I see jokes about the stereotypes of autism all over the internet and people at my school bullying the special needs students and it just makes me angry inside  As a result of these instances  I have never been comfortable telling my friends my past and how it s affected me today in fear of what they would think of me I had thought about a specific date on when I should kill my self  maybe in the middle of my college career or right after I graduate college  I just sometimes tell myself  maybe I don t need to live all the way until I turn   when I can just end everything at   or even right now  Another debate I m often having is where will I go after I kill myself  What will be on the other side
summary: When he was 7 years old he was diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder and ADHD. He had to undergo therapy on his motor skills and speech because he had some minor delays as a little kid. He was placed in special education services and registered for an IEP all the way through high school. He almost committed suicide in his sophomore year of high school because of the shame of being autistic. He is currently attending college.
cleaned: year old diagnose autism spectrum disorder add undergo therapy motor skill speech minor delay little kid place special education service register sep way high school commit suicide sophomore year high school shame autistic currently attend college
